description: Table containing data about steering units in MS561Pro software

columns.name: Unit name
columns.description: This column represents the MSG Article of the steering unit

columns.name: Protocol
columns.description: This column represents the communication protocol of this steering unit

columns.name: Comment
columns.description: This column represents the status of development of steering unit. Done means it is finished. All other - it is still in development

columns.name: TOP Rating
columns.description: This column represents if this steeng unit is top popular or not. TOP10 means that it is in TOP 10 popular units.

columns.name: Read ID
columns.description: This column represents the possibility of reading identification data of the unit similar like diagnostic scanner does

columns.name: Read DTC
columns.description: This column represents the possibility of reading the DTCs (Diagnostic trouble codes) of the unit similar like diagnostic scanner does

columns.name: Live data
columns.description: This column represents the possibility of reading the 'Measured values' ('Live data') of the unit similar like diagnostic scanner does

columns.name: Parametrization
columns.description: This column represents the possibility to make Parametrization (Dataset uploading) to the steering unit

columns.name: Programm.
columns.description: This column represents the possibility of programming (flashing) this steering units and amount of firmwares, attached to this program in MS561Pro software

columns.name: Special func.
columns.description: This column represents the list of some special functions which are available in MS561Pro software for this steering unit

columns.name: Cable
columns.description: This column represents the compatible special cable for connecting this steering unit

columns.name: Read ID
columns.description: This column represents the

columns.name: Univ. FR program
columns.description: This column represents the name of program for universal Flexray cable MS-39000. Can be used only for units with Flexray protocol

columns.name: Univ. FR adapt.
columns.description: This column represents the name of adapters for connecting this steering unit to universal Flexray cable MS-39000. Can be used only for units with Flexray protocol

columns.name: Univ. cab
columns.description: This column represents the possibility to connect ths steering unit using universal cable MS-35671. Can not be used only for units with Flexray protocol

columns.name: OEM
columns.description: This column represents the list of OEM (Original Equipment Manufacturers) numbers for this steering unit

columns.name: Group of vehicles
columns.description: This column represents the automobile concern which makes the vehicle with this steering unit

columns.name: Vehicles
columns.description: This column represents the list of vehicles which use this steering unit

columns.name: Photo
columns.description: This column represents if there is a photo of this steering unit in MS561Pro software or not

columns.name: Connection diagram
columns.description: This column represents if there is a connection diagram for this steering unit in MS561Pro software or not
